can_cancel_anytime.question: Can I cancel anytime?
can_cancel_anytime.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings.

refund_policy.question: Do I get a refund?
refund_policy.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for new subscriptions.

data_security.question: Is my data secure?
data_security.answer: All data is encrypted and stored securely according to international standards.

plan_changes.question: Can I upgrade/downgrade later?
plan_changes.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.
